attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Harry Cohen, who defrauded the taxpayer by claiming £100,000 second home allowances on is constituency home by naming his second home as a house in Essex, 70 miles away, should be sent to jail for defrauding the taxpayer.

rejection.details: Only the police can take the decision to prosecute an individual
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
